characters.personalityTraits: I've lost too many friends, and I'm slow to make new ones.
characters.ideals: Responsibility. I do what I must and obey just authority. (Lawful)
characters.bonds: I would lay down my life for the people I served with.
characters.flaws: My hatred of my enemies is blind and unreasoning.

characters.bonds: I will become the greatest thief that ever lived.
characters.flaws: I have a 'tell' that reveals when I'm lying.
characters.ideals: Freedom. Chains are meant to be broken, as are those who would forge them. (Chaotic)
characters.personalityTraits: I would rather make a new friend than a new enemy.

characters.bonds: I am in love with the heir of a family that my family despises.
characters.flaws: I too often hear veiled insults and threats in every word addressed to me, and I'm quick to anger.
characters.ideals: Independence. I must prove that I can handle myself without the coddling of my family. (Chaotic)
characters.personalityTraits: The common folk love me for my kindness and generosity.

weapons.weaponQuality: This spear is impossibly light. It can be thrown twice the normal distance that a spear normally could be, without penalty.
weapons.weaponPhysicalFeature: The blade of this spear is a flat, sharpened bird of prey, its wings spread viciously, its beak open in a scream. Every part of it is sharp.
weapons.famousFor: it was the arcane focus of a powerful archmage.

weapons.weaponQuality: This is a magician’s dagger. It can be thrown at any person, yet it always stops before striking them, instead choosing to hover in the air in front of them.
weapons.weaponPhysicalFeature: This shard of plate armor has been wrapped in multiple cloths for use as a dagger.

weapons.weaponQuality: This rapier shines with a pure, white light if undead are nearby.
weapons.weaponPhysicalFeature: This rapier is etched with vines, and its pommel is shaped like a leaf.
weapons.famousFor: it’s ugly in appearance, but its quality is unmatched.

weapons.weaponQuality: This weapon is equipped with a small buckler. You gain a minor armor bonus when wielding it.
weapons.weaponPhysicalFeature: This spear is a rusted old harpoon from a sunken privateer vessel.
weapons.famousFor: it’s ugly in appearance, but its quality is unmatched.

weapons.weaponQuality: This axe is designed for boarding ships. It grants advantage on any checks made to climb wooden surfaces.
weapons.weaponPhysicalFeature: This golden axe is of elven design. The head is forged in the shape of an eagle’s wing.
weapons.famousFor: it was forged from the fragments of another famous weapon.

weapons.weaponQuality: This bow, when nocked, has a slight pull as if magnetically telling you where danger lies and directing you to hidden enemies.
weapons.weaponPhysicalFeature: This composite bow is constructed of a dozen different woods from across the realm. It was built to celebrate a historic alliance between a dozen kingdoms.
weapons.famousFor: it slew a demi-god or deity.
